item.title: Blood Runs Cold
item.description: â€œBlood Runs Cold is a gruesome take on the much-loved Hidden Object genre. The story follows journalist Paige Harper as she attempts to prove her innocence, having been framed for a series of horrifying crimes. Subjected to a trial by media in a world where news is more about shocking headlines than truth, players must assist Paige as she delves into the dark and twisted mind of a serial killer.
